column4: Mi laptop gets stucked and I can't hit any key, not even ctrl alt f2 or f3. Help, please.
sonicchao: I don't think so
sonicchao:how do I find the problem
sinchchao: yes, before I had vista and never happened something like that
sonicchao: when I am using it
sonichchao: specially when Im gettin some files from my home network
sonicchao: it is pretty weird and unpredictable
sonicchao, no, my computer is 3 months old and happens only in ubuntu
and SonicChao: I've had similar problems, but they vanished when I disabled compiz effects ...
thanks for the advice
what happened to you?
no worries, it's not an awesome solution ... but ... System-> Preferences -> Appearance, click on the "Visual Effects" tab, and select "None".
I had random hard locks where I couldn't do anything, and they appeared to be video related - because they got a whole lot worse when I started using dual screens
how did you disable compiz, because that's what you did, right?
As I said earlier  dadehoog: mario: no worries, it's not an awesome solution ... but ... System-> Preferences -> Appearance, click on the "Visual Effects" tab, and select "None".
i already have none there, but thanks
and you're still getting hard lock-ups ?
sometimes
as i said is unpredictable
have you installed any restricted-drivers ? eg. nvidia, ati, etc ?
yes, my wireless
but that's not the graphic stuff
yeah, what is your wireless card/nic ? and what did you have to install ?
no i did not install that, is an intel prowireless 3945
